Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Permits an eligible retirement system member to receive, in lieu of an ordinary death benefit, a death benefit such member would otherwise be entitled to receive
Summary: Permits an eligible retirement system member to receive, in lieu of an ordinary death benefit, a death benefit such member would otherwise be entitled to receive provided such member is a state-paid judge or justice of the unified court system or a housing judge of the civil court of the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to death benefits for the beneficiaries of certain members of the retirement system
